website_summaries.verdict: Sonic's new racing adventure speeds past its predecessor and delivers a kart racer that can keep up with the best in the genre.
pros: Controlling the crazy vehicles feels greatCreative and varied track design that changes mid-raceGreat local multiplayerTransformed vehicles feel significantly different
cons: Can feel slow at times when not boostingDanica Patrick is out of place

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the whole family. Good for 4/5 years or older. My 4 does have a hard time controlling the turn because the game changes from land to air to water, it’s just how the game play is. Graphics is okay, game control is not bad. Kids friendly, with many characters to pick from. Overall animation is great. If the game senses that a player is struggling with certain aspect of the game, such as turning, it will suggest a guiding line for the player. This game is a good alternative to Mario Kart. You can do 4 players split screen.
customer_reviews.author: ThaGoodGuy18

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for my 10yo son who used to enjoy Mario Cart. This game is super fun to play and is something we can do as a family. It's easy enough to understand. For those of us who don't play video games there is definitely a learning curve on using the controls to get the cars to do what we want. It gave my son an opportunity to teach me something and demonstrate his compassion to me for my consistent last place finish. I will get the hang of this soon because it is VERY FUN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iowan1988

customer_reviews.title: Very similar to Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were looking for a game like Mario Kart that we could play on our Xbox One. This is as close as it gets. It’s a good game for everyone to play as you can play online, split screen, or both. It takes a bit to learn how to drift, which is where the real speed comes from.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past.
customer_reviews.text: Talk about nostalgic, I used to play sonic with my little brother when I was a kid. Now I get to play with my son. He LOVES this game.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Brazee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and undamaged
customer_reviews.text: I needed some age-appropriate games for my 10 year-old niece who was visiting during the summer. I used to play sonic the hedgehog on the Sega Genesis console when I was a kid. Racing games are fun.
customer_reviews.author: javamandon

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to Mario cart for Xbox. Best of all it works on 360 and Xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL S COOK

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Fun racing game for all ages. You can't go wrong with Sonic. We bought this for a younger player because it's easy to get the hang of and simple yet fun gameplay. Sonic Transformed gives you some added character choices that aren't your usual Characters seen in the games giving it a new and fun twist to the other version. This is a really fun game for families to play together and have a little friendly competition of who's the greatest racer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: As described and pictured. Will buy product again. Came in brand new packaging and plastic nor seal was broken. Great birthday gift!!! No glitches or scratches on disc.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I really like this game and it's a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game and it's a lot of fun! My roommates love it and it's been great. I don't like however how you can't really upgrade your characters besides unlocking certain modes and for some reason the disc I have glitches sometimes. It's super weird but it's done it 3 times now since I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: My kids wanted a racing game because they'd seen me playing my own racing game, so I was excited when I found this one. It took them a little while to get the hang of the game, but they figured it out pretty quickly and now they love playing it. The controllers were a little hard to work with, so I bought them a steering wheel, which helped tremendously. They've been playing for a while and they haven't even made a dent in this game. They never get bored with it, so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work it drives itself in tge wrong direction even if you turn the car the right way the camera is still in the wrong direction
customer_reviews.author: shatima davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome graphics. My daughter turned 6 and this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome graphics. My daughter turned 6 and this is her very first video game. She LOVES it. It is easy enough for her to play on her own without much help/supervision after getting it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Son loved it. Great for younger players. Came in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Lost one star because the little clip that holds the game in the case was broke so it was sliding around in there. Game played fine though so not a big deal.

customer_reviews.title: Sonic fiends
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. I’m going to assume that he enjoyed since he played it every day for a week straight clearing all of the boards.

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift and child loved it so A+ in my book
customer_reviews.text: Child loved Sonic and was very excited to get this game. Later feedback said it was fun too.

customer_reviews.title: Drinking game
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a replacement to “beerio carts” for the Xbox works great for that

customer_reviews.title: ... friend of mine was telling me how much she loved this game but couldn't find it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine was telling me how much she loved this game but couldn't find it anywhere. I ordered it and gave it to her as a gift. She loves it and I have played it a few times. I have a Playstation 4 and am more into first person shooters but this is a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Great game for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this for Christmas. They are HUGE MarioKart fans (Wii) but converting over to Xbox, there wasn't much for choices like that. The kids really seem to like this game and have played it a lot since they opened it. Would definitely recommend for younger kids (mine are 8 and 6).
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fun Racing Game With Great Graphics
customer_reviews.text: This game is a blast! It reminds me a lot of Mario Kart, but I like this one better. I play it with my fiancee quite a bit and it's a lot of fun for both of us. The graphics are much better than I thought they would be! I like how you can transform your vehicle into a boat and a plane as well. This is a great racing game!
customer_reviews.author: Jegason Diviant

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: received this game today, I maybe played this game for all of about 15 minutes. I finished a race and pressed continue and the screen went pitch black, couldn't get the game to come back up after numerous attempts. returning immediately .

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Plays on Xbox One..bought for my nephews 4 and 7 to play two player and they love it. They can race or just basically hunt each other. Well worth the low price. Buy.

customer_reviews.text: This is no Mario Kart, but this is still highly enjoyable! I'm glad I got it!

customer_reviews.title: Great game! It rivals Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Great game! It rivals Mario Kart. Great characters and many vehicles to choose from which transform depending upon the track. Fun game for the family!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great Game (Plays on XBox One)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and plays on our XBox one with no problem. The kids love it and so do the adults.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of fun and a great Family game we can all play together with Great, fun graphics, easy controls and fun characters. We especially enjoy the battle feature which is similar to Mario Cart. The only thing I don't like at all is it does not appear that you can play multiplayer with just yourselves. The game generated racers are always there, no matter what race or settings you choose. If anyone knows of a way around this where we could race just against ourselves please let me know, thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: With up to 4 players, the entire family can compete in this Mario Cart like game. There are many characters and cars to choose from, and many levels waiting to be unlocked. Easy enough for a 5 year old, yet entertaining enough for adults. Very happy to have purchased this game.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game. My nieces love playing very time they come to see me.

customer_reviews.title: The worst.
customer_reviews.text: The worst. Not worthy of any amount of money. Not for kids under 8, which seems strange.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like Mario Kart. Not even fun to play. Gave it away.
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me this was Xbox version of Mario Kart. I gave it away. It's loosely similar to Mario Kart but the controls, steering, gameplay and graphics are very bad.

customer_reviews.title: No issues. Plays well.
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. Have had about 3-4 weeks now.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart Racing Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great cart racing game! I was instantly hooked. I enjoy the different terrain which takes some getting use to. Do not miss the opportunity to pick up this game. Enjoy! Edited December 03, 2014 The game allows 4 player offline co-op in campaign mode and all other modes. The gameplay is great. This was worth the buy.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for our oldest son for Christmas. He loves it!! It is perfect for his age at 7, he can figure out how to play without too much help. A good variety of tracks & different play!!!

customer_reviews.title: but it's nice you get to play with different characters and other ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4-yr old loves this game. It reminds me of Mario Kart a bit, but it's nice you get to play with different characters and other sorts of transportation. Would recommend for children.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and colorful game!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old and my husband are constantly playing this game. They love the racing and it has lots of levels and it has rounds for each game. The only thing that bothers me about this game is that your hands will hurt at first until you can figure out how to hold the controls when you drive. Make sure your kids rest their hands in between games.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: This is a really fun, challenging racing game!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be too easy when I bought it, but now that I've played it, I realize that it's just the perfect level of difficulty for me! The changes between land, air, and water really affect how the game is played, and it's taking me some time to adapt. I would suggest this game for anyone who wants a more challenging racing game. :)

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought that game after renting it from Redbox. My two boys thought this game was awesome. As an adult, I find it very entertaining. You can play up to four players! Which is great when friends come over. First you choose your race course and then your racer. As you go along the race course you find your racer changing from a car, to a speedboat, to a plane. Such a fun game!

(Except just a few areas) So it makes for plenty of family fun.

Normally racing games are fairly easy for me to beat, I still can't beat some of the levels on hard, gave up. Fun game.

product_meta.title: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed - Xbox 360
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360Sonic and the All-Stars cast line up on the starting grid once again to battle for supremacy in the ultimate race. Compete across land, water and air in incredible transforming vehicles that change from cars to boats to planes mid-race. Master your driving skills as you drift, barrel roll and boost to overtake your rivals, or use your weapons tactically and unleash your All-Star move to gain the winning advantage. 

It's not just your fellow racers you need to watch out for: as the road falls away beneath you, or the river runs dry, new routes emerge and your vehicle transforms to take advantage of the terrain. Discover alternative routes and short cuts as you perfect the course in this adrenaline fuelled dash to the finish line - racing will never be the same again.
feature_bullets: This is no ordinary race. Each character is equipped with their own unique vehicle that can transform into a car, boat and plane to take advantage of the changing terrains.
Take to land, sea & air as you race through 16 dynamically changing courses inspired by SEGA's illustrious gaming history.
Race as one of the 20+ legendary All-Stars. The starting line-up has been transformed as new iconic characters from the world of SEGA join the race.
Utilize an arsenal of devastating weapons which require skill to aim, shoot, evade and block.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars948 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
